name: Magic in the Trees: The New Found
name_original: Magic in the Trees: The New Found
description: This game is based on "The Quiet Year" game story I created in class, and it introduces the setting when the town was severely suffering from food scarcity, but there is no way to overcome it. The only hope they could rely on sincerely believes in the old legend that a sorcerer is living in a dark secret place.
